name: GKAchievementDescription
desc: An object containing the text and artwork used to present an achievement to a player.

items.name: class func loadAchievementDescriptions(completionHandler: (([GKAchievementDescription]?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Downloads the localized descriptions of achievements from Game Center.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The string you enter in App Store Connect that uniquely identifies the achievement.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: A localized title for the achievement.

items.name: var unachievedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized description of the achievement that you display when the player hasn’t completed the achievement.

items.name: var achievedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized description of the achievement that you display when the player completes the achievement.

items.name: var maximumPoints: Int
items.desc: The number of points that the player earns when completing the achievement.

items.name: var image: NSImage?
items.desc: The achievement’s artwork that you display when the player completes the achievement.

items.name: var isHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that states whether the achievement is initially visible to players.

items.name: var isReplayable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that states whether the player can earn the achievement multiple times.

items.name: class func incompleteAchievementImage() -> UIImage
items.desc: A common image that you can display when the player hasn’t completed the achievement.

items.name: class func placeholderCompletedAchievementImage() -> UIImage
items.desc: A placeholder image that you can display when the player completes the achievement.

items.name: func loadImage(completionHandler: ((UIImage?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads the image to display when the player completes the achievement.

items.name: var groupIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the group that the achievement description is part of.
